attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: pagination size(2.7.6)

attributes.name: background
attributes.desc: whether the buttons have a background color

attributes.name: page-size
attributes.desc: item count of each page

attributes.name: v-model:page-size
attributes.desc: item count of each page

attributes.name: default-page-size
attributes.desc: default initial value of page size, not setting is the same as setting 10

attributes.name: total
attributes.desc: total item count

attributes.name: page-count
attributes.desc: total page count. Set either total or page-count and pages will be displayed; if you need page-sizes, total is required

attributes.name: pager-count
attributes.desc: number of pagers. Pagination collapses when the total page count exceeds this value

attributes.name: current-page
attributes.desc: current page number

attributes.name: v-model:current-page
attributes.desc: current page number

attributes.name: default-current-page
attributes.desc: default initial value of current-page, not setting is the same as setting 1

attributes.name: layout
attributes.desc: layout of Pagination, elements separated with a comma
attributes.optionValue: string (consists of sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper, ->, total, slot)

attributes.name: page-sizes
attributes.desc: options of item count per page

attributes.name: append-size-to
attributes.desc: which element the size dropdown appends to(2.8.4)

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for the page size Select's dropdown

attributes.name: prev-text
attributes.desc: text for the prev button

attributes.name: prev-icon
attributes.desc: icon for the prev button, has a lower priority than prev-text

attributes.name: next-text
attributes.desc: text for the next button

attributes.name: next-icon
attributes.desc: icon for the next button, has a lower priority than next-text

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether Pagination is disabled

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether Pagination select dropdown is teleported to the body(2.3.13)

attributes.name: hide-on-single-page
attributes.desc: whether to hide when there's only one page

attributes.name: small
attributes.desc: whether to use small pagination(deprecated)

slots.name: default
slots.desc: custom content. To use this, you need to declare `slot` in `layout`

events.name: @prev-click
events.desc: triggers when the prev button is clicked and current page changes

events.name: @next-click
events.desc: triggers when the next button is clicked and current page changes
